Entry.JapaneseText: ……ワルトゥというのは、 どんなヤツなんだ？
Entry.EnglishText: What kind of person is Walto?

Entry.JapaneseText: ワルトゥは、ガジュマの能力者だよ。 <Eugene>はワルトゥをかなり買ってたよね。
Entry.EnglishText: Walto is a Gajuma who can use Force. <Eugene> has a lot of respect for him.

Entry.JapaneseText: ああ、ワルトゥは俺の戦友とも言うべき男で、 <Blue>王の盾<White>の古参でもある。
Entry.EnglishText: Yes. Walto and I were brothers in arms. He's a veteran of the <Blue>Royal Shield<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: フォルスもさる事ながら、強い精神力と優れた 戦術眼を持っていて、作戦に欠かせない存在だった。
Entry.EnglishText: In addition to his Force, he has a strong will and an eye for tactics, making him indispensable for any operation.

Entry.JapaneseText: ワルトゥなら、<Eugene>が声をかければ、 仲間になってくれると思うんだけどなぁ？
Entry.EnglishText: Do you think Walto would join us if you asked him?

Entry.Notes: I just think Eugene would say Do Not instead of Don't.
